Package com.secres

Class GraphCharts

java.lang.Object
com.secres.GraphCharts
public class GraphCharts
extends Object
A Utility class (i.e. a class that is not meant to have instances)

GraphCharts contains static methods for:
1. Creating the View of a JFreeChart
2. Creating the Model of the data for that JFreeChart
3. Handling all other visualization from the JFreeChart

Author:
Pranav Amarnath
